page.title: 10GOLF
page.content: THE GOLF CLUB WAS FORMED IN 1884.THE WORKING MENS CLUB WAS FORMED IN 1885. THE COURSE HAD ONLY TWELVE HOLES.BOTH CLUBS PLAYED ON THE SAME COURSE.THE COURSE THE COURSE WAS EXTENDED TO 18 HOLES AROUND 1890 THESE ARE THE NAMES OF THE HOLES. 1.OUTWARD BOUND 2.THE DIP 3.BEACON 4.CLIFF 5.QUARRY 6.SANDY BUNKER 7.CHECKERS 8.THE COTTAGE 9.HOSPITAL 10BOWLING 11BLUE HOLES APPROACH 12.PANDEMONIUM 13.POND 14.BIG WHAM 15.SHOREWARD 16.MIND THE DITCH 17.ALMOST THERE 18HOME HOSPITAL GREEN HOSPITAL GREEN IS SO CALLED BECAUSE IT IS NEXT TO AN ISOLATION HOSPITAL FOR SCARLET FEAVER.
